title: Courgette and Clam Fritters
ingredients: ['4 eggs', '250ml milk', '185g diced courgette', '225g chopped razor clams', '1 small onion, diced', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '55g breadcrumbs', '60g plain flour', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '250ml oil for frying', '30g butter']
